caption.title: Results of the sensitivity analysis
caption.p: Halving or increasing 2-folds the conservation targets (i.e. a percentage of speciesâ€™ environmentally suitable area to be protected). Selected counties for the establishment of protected areas networks for the conservation of Atlantic Forest endemic birds, under current and future climate change scenarios, using a county level strategy (ignoring the boundary length modifier - BLM) and regional level strategy (considering BLM).
